section-2.title: Wavyroom
section-2.description: Choose the right model for you and create yout own space.

title.text-1: It is possible to create various

section-1.para: We focus on products that are elaborately designed and perfecty manufactured through the commercialization of homes and the manufacturing of construction.

section-2.title: Our vision and mission
section-2.header: Movement of culture through commercialization of space

description.desc-1: We have developed a better approach in construction methods, prioritizing certainty in design and ensuring uncompromised quality.
description.desc-2: From our self-owned production facilities to project management services and installation sites, our team possesses the knowledge and experience to design and execute modular spaces. Since 2019, we have started supplying doemstically and are currently exporting to international markets, placing customers at the center of this entire process. We aim to redefine the meaning of ‘home’ and create permanent spaces through productization.

description.desc-1: We envision a future where everyone has a better home. Everyone living in a meticulously designed and well-built dwelling that inspires, functions seamlessly, and considers the environment, we aspire to a world where our living splaces enhance our lives.
description.desc-2: Wavyroom inspires you to reimagine the potential of every site, offering beautiful and flexible spaces tailored to your lifestyle. Whether it’s a second home for relaxation, a guest home for inviting friends and family to share happy moments, or a space for additional income through commercialization, such as offices or F&B ventures, Wavyroom is committed to providing spaces that align with you, both now and in the future.

section-4.title: Our value
section-4.description: Technology has transformed industries, and the construction sector is no exception. We have now created better methods for building homes. We prioritize transparency in pricing and certainty in design, refusing to compromise on quality. We produce a meticulously crafted product - a high-quality “home” with impeccable completion.

list-1.heading: Constant and high quality production
list-1.sub-heading: We produce consistently high-quality homes through Spacewavy's expertise embedded in our self-operated manufacturing facility. Our production line reflects the know-how of SpaceWavy, ensuring a consistently high level of quality.

list-2.heading: An outstanding design
list-2.sub-heading: We provide beautiful and functional designs through our R&D organization, comprised of architects, industrial designers, and spatial designers who have been active in the global construction market.

list-3.heading: An outstanding design
list-3.sub-heading: We provide beautiful and functional designs through our R&D organization, comprised of architects, industrial designers, and spatial designers who have been active in the global construction market.

card.text: Do you want to join Spacewavy?

heading.text-1: Create your own space with ease.
heading.text-2: Explore the manufacturing process of Wavyroom.

card-1.heading: Advancing the contract
card-1.description: Upon placing an order, based on the estimate generated, a representative will contact you within one day to guide you through the contract process.

card-2.heading: Permit processing
card-2.description: For construction, obtaining permits typically takes around 3 to 6 months. Wavyroom has all the necessary drawings and documents prepared for the permitting process, enabling a faster progression.

card-3.heading: Wavyroom production
card-3.description: After completing the construction filing, we will guide you through the production consent process. Once the earliest possible start date for production is determined, we will communicate the estimated schedule to the customer. *If foundation work is required, a separate estimated schedule will be provided as soon as the earliest start date for production is determined.*For projects requiring basic infrastructure work, please inquire separately, and we will assist you throughout the process.

card-4.heading: Product inspection and shipping
card-4.description: After the completion of the production, a final inspection will be conducted at the Wavyroom factory with the customer.

card-5.heading: Installation
card-5.description: After shipping, the installation will be carried out on-site through the transportation team.

title.text-1: Say goodbye to complicated construction processes and join us for a party at Wavyroom!

section-1-side.para-1: Wavyroom customer support center representatives are available for assistance at all times.

faq-1.question: How is Wavyroom different from other modular houses?
faq-1.answer: For non-bankbook deposits, you can deposit the product purchase price through PC banking, internet banking, telephone banking, or directly at a nearby bank. The name of the depositor entered at the time of order must match the name of the actual depositor, and the deposit must be made within 7 days. Orders that have not been deposited will be automatically canceled.
